00001 #ifndef H_mbari_point
00002 # define H_mbari_point
00003 
00004 # include <boost/mpl/min_max.hpp>
00005 
00006 # include <algorithm>
00007 # include <cmath>
00008 
00009 namespace mbari {
00010 
00011   template<unsigned Dim>
00012   class point {
00013   public:
00014     typedef double       *iterator;
00015     typedef double const *const_iterator;
00016 
00017     typedef boost::mpl::int_<Dim> dimension_;
00018 
00019     enum {
00020       dimension = dimension_::value
00021     };
00022 
00023     point() {
00024       std::fill(begin(), end(), 0.0);
00025     }
00026     template<class Iter>
00027     point(Iter from, Iter to) {
00028       unsigned i;
00029       for(i=0; to!=from && i<Dim; ++i, ++from) 
00030        m_value[i] = *to;
00031       std::fill(m_value+i, end(), 0.0);
00032     }
00033 
00034     template<unsigned D2>
00035     explicit point(point<D2> const &other) {
00036       unsigned i;
00037       for(i=0; i< boost::mpl::min< dimension_, typename point<D2>::dimension_ >::type::value; ++i)
00038        m_value[i] = other[i];
00039       std::fill(m_value+i, end(), 0.0);
00040     }
00041     ~point() {}
00042 
00043     size_t size() const {
00044       return dimension;
00045     }
00046 
00047     iterator begin() {
00048       return m_value;
00049     }
00050     iterator end() {
00051       return m_value+Dim;
00052     }
00053 
00054     const_iterator begin() const {
00055       return m_value;
00056     }
00057     const_iterator end() const {
00058       return m_value+Dim;
00059     }
00060     double &operator[](size_t idx) {
00061       // if( Dim<=idx ) 
00062       //      throw dimension_error("Index larger than point dimensions");
00063       return m_value[idx];
00064     }
00065     double const &operator[](size_t idx) const {
00066       // if( Dim<=idx ) 
00067       //      throw dimension_error("Index larger than point dimensions");
00068       return m_value[idx];
00069     }
00070 
00071     template<class Iter>
00072     point &add(Iter from, Iter to) {
00073       for(unsigned i=0; from!=to && i<Dim; ++i, ++from)
00074        m_value[i] += *from;
00075       return *this;
00076     }
00077     point &operator+=(point const &other) {
00078       return add(other.begin(), other.end());
00079     }
00080     point operator+ (point const &other) const {
00081       return point<Dim>(*this).operator+=(other);
00082     }
00083 
00084     template<class Iter>
00085     point &substract(Iter from, Iter to) {
00086       for(unsigned i=0; from!=to && i<Dim; ++i, ++from)
00087        m_value[i] -= *from;
00088       return *this;
00089     }
00090     point &operator-=(point const &other) {
00091       return substract(other.begin(), other.end());
00092     }
00093     point operator- (point const &other) const {
00094       return point<Dim>(*this).operator-=(other);
00095     }
00096     
00097     point &operator *=(double factor) {
00098       for(unsigned i=0; i<Dim; ++i)
00099        m_value[i] *= factor;
00100       return *this;
00101     }
00102     point operator* (double factor) const {
00103       return point<Dim>(*this).operator*=(factor);
00104     }
00105     point &operator /=(double factor) {
00106       for(unsigned i=0; i<Dim; ++i)
00107        m_value[i] /= factor;
00108       return *this;
00109     }
00110     point operator/ (double factor) const {
00111       return point<Dim>(*this).operator/=(factor);
00112     }
00113 
00114     double dot(point const &other) const {
00115       double ret = 0.0;
00116       for(unsigned i=0; i<Dim; ++i)
00117        ret += m_value[i]*other[i];
00118       return ret;
00119     }
00120     double norm_2() const {
00121       return sqrt(dot(*this));
00122     }
00123   private:
00124     double m_value[Dim];
00125   }; // mbari::point<>
00126   
00127 
00128 } // mbari
